# Next.js Video Narrative Website - Project Setup

## Project Overview
Building a scroll-based narrative video website with Next.js App Router, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.

## Setup Progress
- [x] Create project instructions file
- [ ] Scaffold Next.js project
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Create app structure and components
- [ ] Configure Tailwind CSS
- [ ] Build and test project

## Development Guidelines
- Next.js App Router (not Pages Router)
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Framer Motion for scroll animations
- 5 full-screen video chapters
- Minimal, clean UI design
